title: SCRIPTER(laughingwig) PLEASE RIOT look  into this or ban the guy. in consecutive games scripting
body: Watching my brother play on his account 2 games in  a row Saw a player SCRIPTING IGN: laughingwig PLEASE look into this i guarantee that he is scripting.

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules

Reports do not belong on the boards. Instead, make a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new).
